snippet.title: A Complete Beginner’s Guide to Sunflower Land by Mystic7
snippet.description:
Today we’re hopping into a NEW Play To Earn NFT game Sunflower Land! This guide goes over how to download, play, and strategize Sunflower Land. Have you played this Play To Earn NFT game?

#NFT #SFL #SunflowerLand

This video was created and is fully credited to MYSTIC7 - Please subscribe to him for more amazing game content -- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5FQyUQPymgQpVAfSDy3-Uw

Sunflower Land: https://sunflower-land.com/

How to create a Metamask Wallet: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CioJ4...
How to bridge ETH to Polygon: https://youtu.be/T4zKKEfiO9g
Polygon Bridge: https://wallet.polygon.technology/bri...
Polygon ETH (WETH) Contract Address: 0x7ceb23fd6bc0add59e62ac25578270cff1b9f619
You can swap your ETH (on Polygon) to MATIC here: https://wallet.polygon.technology/tok...

Join the GM7 Discord:  https://bit.ly/3G91Arw

Edited By the HOMIE: https://twitter.com/WhyldeGamer
Main Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/MYSTlC7
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MYSTIC7
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mystic7

Business inquiries only: theoriginalmystic7@gmail.com

0:00 - 1:11 Intro
1:11 - 3:05 How to get Sunflower Land
3:05 - 5:11 Farm Tour
5:11 - 8:30 How To Farm
8:30 - 11:34 Resources Explained
11:34 - 13:13 General Strategy
13:13 - 16:46 Scheduling
16:46 - 17:59 Plants VS Animals
17:59 - 19:00 Optimize Your Gameplay
19:00 - 21:08 Find Your Style
